Posts.Content: I have been referred to a genetic oncologist with the hope of having the BRCA tests. I have been told to allow an hour to an hour and a half for this consultation and have been given a family history form to complete. What on earth will we discuss for over a hour!? This is before the test is even done.
Posts.Title: BRCA tests

Posts.Content: ..in the brain (this is the main one), liver, chest....I looked at the brain tumor forum but it says its for primary cancers...
Posts.Title: Where do I post? Secondary breast cancer
